name: AddBaseCollaborator
description:
Add a collaborator to an Airtable base.

Use this tool to add a new collaborator to a specified Airtable base. It facilitates inviting one collaborator at a time.

parameters.name: base_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Airtable base to which the collaborator will be added.

parameters.name: collaborator_info
parameters.description: JSON object with collaborator details. Accepts 'user' or 'group' types.

collaborators.description: This endpoint accepts two types of collaborators: **individual user** and **group**.
